title.en: I Don't Know What My Little Sister's Friend Is Thinking!

altTitles.en: Imouto no Tomodachi ga Nani Kangaeteru no ka Wakaranai
Je ne sais pas ce que la copine de ma petite sœur pense
No sé que piensa la amiga de mi hermana pequeña
No sé que piensa la amiga de mi hermanita
Tôi chẳng hiểu cô bạn của em gái tôi đang nghĩ gì!
Я не знаю, о чем думает подруга моей младшей сестры!
मुझे नहीं पता कि मेरी छोटी बहन की सहेली क्या सोच रही है!
妹の友達が何考えてるのかわからない

description.en:
My sister's friend Tsuyu-chan is a quiet girl who and i can't figure out what she is thinking. However, it doesn't seem that I'm much disliked… Acclaimed as "cute" on SNS! Daily popular short love comedy with a total of 1.1 million likes!  


---

This is being serialized in the GANMA app… Everything there revolves around the number of likes/hearts each chapter receives. The continued serialization and chances of getting a volume release depends on the number of likes/heart.  
 **Hence kindly follow this [Guide](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/575907648109543430/714701770118660196/B16.png) and hit the like/heart button for chapters and support the author and the manga!**  
  
Also consider donating to Author's Fanbox.  
  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/rayrei1414)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=17227911)

- [Author's Fanbox](https://www.pixiv.net/fanbox/creator/17227911) [Pixiv's Version of Patreon]
